whoever shot Tupac is losing his fucking mind right now.

Fuck west coast holograms.

Hologram 2Pac is just a distraction to cover up the fact that Drake is a cyborg invented by the record companies to make grown men cry.

The Tupac hologram at Coachella wasn't half as amazing as the Janis Joplin sock puppet at Lilith Fair in '96.

"Don't make me a hologram" - Tupac, probably

I spent at least 8 minutes of my day today telling my asst to look into making a hologram of me to sit in my office so I can go to Mexico.
